comments:
description:
NPE throw out when click on edit group in cheat sheet when delete table group

steps to reproduce:
1. new a grouped list report with template.
2. create data source and data set with clicking on buttons in cheat sheet.
3. then delete table group 
4. click on edit table group 


actual result:
NPE exception throw out

expected result:
No exception throw out
